PearlUserGoalsEmotional.name: Emotional
PearlUserGoalsEmotional.description: Emotional health refers to the awareness and understanding of your own emotions and the ability to express them in a positive, constructive way.

PearlUserGoalsEnvironmental.name: Environmental
PearlUserGoalsEnvironmental.description: Environmental health refers to your ability to live in harmony with the environment.

PearlUserGoalsFinancial.name: Financial
PearlUserGoalsFinancial.description: Financial health refers to your ability to effectively manage your financial resources.

PearlUserGoalsIntellectual.name: Intellectual
PearlUserGoalsIntellectual.description: Intellectual health refers to your ability to make decisions by drawing from your general body of knowledge, creativity and common sense.

PearlUserGoalsOccupational.name: Occupational
PearlUserGoalsOccupational.description: Occupational health refers to your ability to find satisfaction and personal fulfillment with your job or career.

PearlUserGoalsPhysical.name: Physical
PearlUserGoalsPhysical.description: Physical health refers to your ability to maintain a physical condition which allows you to enjoy a healthy quality of life without undue fatigue or stress

PearlUserGoalsSocial.name: Social
PearlUserGoalsSocial.description: Social health refers to your ability to establish and maintain positive relationships with others.

PearlUserGoalsSpiritual.name: Spiritual
PearlUserGoalsSpiritual.description: Spiritual health refers to your ability to realize your moral principles, beliefs and values through your actions.
